statements: SELECT * FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, distance_traveled FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE acceleration_max > 50;
SELECT date, speed_avg FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE distance_traveled < 1000;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE acceleration_max > 60 AND acceleration_min < 20;
SELECT driver_id, speed_avg, acceleration_max FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE speed_avg > 80 ORDER BY speed_avg DESC;
SELECT driver_id, speed_avg FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE distance_traveled > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE acceleration_max > 5 AND acceleration_min < -2 ORDER BY speed_avg ASC, date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, distance_traveled, acceleration_max FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE speed_avg BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY driver_id ASC, distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY speed_avg DESC, distance_traveled ASC;
SELECT driver_id, speed_avg, acceleration_max, acceleration_min FROM HistoricalDrivingBehaviorData WHERE speed_avg > 50 AND acceleration_max < 3 ORDER BY speed_avg DESC, acceleration_max ASC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driving_experience FROM drivers WHERE driving_style = 'cautious';
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driving_experience FROM drivers ORDER BY driving_experience DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driving_style FROM drivers WHERE driving_experience > 5 ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driving_experience, driving_style FROM drivers WHERE driving_experience < 3 AND driving_style = 'aggressive';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driving_experience > 5;
SELECT driver_name, driving_style FROM drivers WHERE driving_style = 'aggressive';
SELECT driver_name, record_date, distance_traveled FROM drivers JOIN driving_records ON drivers.driver_id = driving_records.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY driving_experience DESC;
SELECT AVG(average_speed) AS avg_speed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM driving_records GROUP BY driver_id HAVING count(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_driving_data
SELECT driver_id, driving_date, driving_distance FROM historical_driving_data
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_profile
SELECT driving_date, driving_distance, driving_time FROM historical_driving_data
SELECT data_id, throttle, brake_pressure FROM machine_learning_data
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_profile WHERE driving_experience > 5 ORDER BY driver_age DESC;
SELECT driving_date, driving_distance FROM historical_driving_data WHERE driving_distance > 50 ORDER BY driving_date ASC;

SELECT driver_name, driving_distance, driving_time FROM driver_profile JOIN historical_driving_data ON driver_profile.driver_id = historical_driving_data.driver_id WHERE driving_distance > 100 AND driving_time > '00:30:00';
SELECT driver_name, driver_age, driving_experience FROM driver_profile WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM historical_driving_data GROUP BY driver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3);

SELECT driver_name, driving_date, throttle, brake_pressure FROM driver_profile JOIN machine_learning_data ON driver_profile.driver_id = machine_learning_data.driver_id WHERE throttle > 0.5 AND brake_pressure < 0.3 ORDER BY driving_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT driver_id, acceleration, speed FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT id, destination, route, timestamp FROM NavigationData WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, accuracy, date_created FROM MLModelData ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverBehaviorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT driver_id, acceleration, speed FROM DriverBehaviorData WHERE acceleration > 0.5 AND speed > 60;
SELECT destination, route, distance FROM NavigationData WHERE driver_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT model_name, accuracy, date_created FROM MLModelData WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_info;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM driver_info ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM trip_data WHERE distance_km > 10;
SELECT acceleration_id, acceleration_value, acceleration_time FROM acceleration_data WHERE acceleration_value < -1.5;
SELECT speed_id, speed_value, speed_time FROM speed_data ORDER BY speed_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM driver_info WHERE driving_experience > 5;
SELECT driver_name, driving_experience FROM driver_info ORDER BY driving_experience DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM trip_data WHERE distance_km > 20 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT acceleration_id, acceleration_value, acceleration_time FROM acceleration_data WHERE acceleration_value > 9 ORDER BY acceleration_value DESC;
SELECT speed_id, speed_value, speed_time FROM speed_data WHERE speed_value < 80 ORDER BY speed_value ASC;
